(Minime...Choran sidestepped when Brix tried to tackle him, and then opened 
fire at Brix's back.  So...he was obviously watching Brix, and Brix couldn't 
have snuck up behind him)

Choran/Imprisoner:


Choran saw Imprisoner being sent slamming through a few trees, and fired off 
8 laser bolts at Brix's pelvis from his rapid weapon.  He threw it to the 
ground, arms in the air, he jogged for Firearm and Rex.

"Get him away!  Get him away!  I SURRENDER!  WE SURRENDER!  WE SURRENDER!" 
Internally Choran activated a device in his optic sensors, that would feed 
the info the optics got into two seperate places in his body.  (What Choran 
activated is NOT a weapon, and is unnoticable)
